overview.en: CROS is a such platform that can: Let anyone enter the blockchain world by just one touch;Provide the self-created blockchain ledger, customized collaborative process and self-designed value token;realize a highly effective collaboration and circulation of value.Enabling business intelligence for everyone, Empowering digital economy for the world.
overview.zh: 创新的商业协同平台。让个体一键进入区块链世界，自创建区块链账本、自定义协作流程、自设计Token。变革生产关系，改变价值流通的模式，实现高效的工作协同和价值流通。链通商业智能，赋能数字经济。
